Posts.Content: Apr 15, 2013 04:45PM BCK wrote: Hi, my name is Barbara.  I don't post often but I think the link below should be read and considered before taking Afinitor. www.druglib.com/reported-side-effects/afinitor/seriousness_death/ All of the cause of deaths listed are due to Afinitor!  All 613 of them! Barbara
Posts.Title: Afinitor Mortality Rate Bestbird Chickadee

Posts.Content: May 29, 2011 05:08PM BCK wrote: Lena, I had all the lymph nodes removed from the right axilla in 2001. they were all negative for cancer. In 2003 I had one lymph node removed from my left axilla, also negative for cancer.  I was told I would never develop lymphedema in the left arm. WRONG! In 2005 my left arm swelled up like a balloon and has stayed that way ever since despite therapy. In 2006 my motorcycle skidded on an oil slick at an intersection and I went down and slid with a 700 lb. Harley on top of me.  I sustained severe "road rash" to my right arm but recovered fully with only slight lymphedema.  Go Figure.   Barbara
Posts.Title: Stage IV and lymph node removal DivineMrsM Hopbird

Posts.Content: Jan 4, 2012 08:07AM BCK wrote: Hi Joyce, I live in Mount Laurel, NJ.  I pay for my own health insurance which is Oxford.  They cover in home nurses and nurses aids. I must warn you that this insurance is very expensive but they never question anything and require no pre-certs. Barbara
